alert.title: It's time to choose something new
alert.body: Your bag has been reset and you're ready to reserve your next order

alert.title: Your items are due back in 3 days
alert.body: Pack your bag, attach the pre-paid shipping label, and drop off at your nearest UPS pick-up location

alert.title: You're In
alert.body: You've been invited to complete your sign up and reserve your first order

alert.title: Your membership will resume in 2 days
alert.body: Tap here to extend your pause by a month or resume early

alert.title: Your reservation has been shipped
alert.body: We’ve packed up your items and they’re on the way

alert.title: Your reservation has been delivered
alert.body: We hope you enjoy your items and let us know if you have any questions.
